product.description: Sirloin (beef back) is famous for its softness and light fat taste, suitable for those who love steak with natural sweetness and rich flavor.
Rib Eye (beef flank), famous for its perfect marbling, giving it a natural tenderness and rich flavor when cooked.

reviews.comment: The best rib-eye I've ever had!

product.description: Topblade, a flavorful and tender cut from the shoulder of the cow. Known for its fine marbling, it delivers a rich and juicy taste, ideal for grilling or pan-searing.
Locally sourced beef, carefully selected to provide a lean and flavorful steak experience. Known for its natural taste and moderate tenderness, it is a versatile option for everyday meals.

reviews.comment: It was okay, but I prefer other options.

product.description: Tender cuts of beef, typically sirloin or tenderloin, marinated and stir-fried to perfection. The beef is diced into cubes, which are quickly seared at high heat, creating a crispy outer layer while retaining juiciness inside.

Tender cuts of lamb, typically from the rib or loin, providing a juicy and flavorful steak experience. The meat is known for its slightly gamey taste and rich texture, making it a favorite for steak lovers.

reviews.comment: Tender and flavorful lamb, great experience.

product.description: Tender cuts of beef, often from the sirloin or flank, cooked to perfection and served with a rich and flavorful pepper sauce. The beef is seared to lock in juices and combined with a creamy, peppery sauce that adds depth and heat.

Premium wild-caught or farmed Norwegian salmon, known for its bright pink color, tender texture, and rich, fatty content. Renowned for its high-quality, sustainable sourcing from the cold, clean waters of Norway.
Premium duck breast, carefully smoked to perfection to enhance its natural flavor. The smoking process imparts a rich, savory aroma and a tender texture that melts in the mouth.

A vibrant mix of seasonal fruits, carefully selected for their freshness and flavor. The combination typically includes fruits like watermelon, pineapple, mango, papaya, strawberries, grapes, and citrus fruits, offering a refreshing and tropical taste.

A refreshing, non-alcoholic mocktail that combines vibrant tropical flavors with a zesty twist. The Tornadol is a creative blend of fruit juices, soda, and a hint of spice, delivering a fun and fizzy experience for any occasion.

A vibrant, refreshing cocktail featuring a blend of green fruits and herbs, designed to evoke the freshness and tranquility of a forest. This cocktail offers a harmonious mix of fruity sweetness and herbal zest, with a delightful green hue.

A delightful, non-alcoholic mocktail that captures the essence of the freshest fruits in season. This refreshing beverage combines a variety of sweet, tangy, and juicy fruits, offering a burst of natural flavors with every sip.

A high-quality wine from the renowned wine regions of Chile, celebrated for its rich, bold flavors and exceptional balance. Chile is known for producing a wide range of red, white, and sparkling wines, with favorable climates that enhance the development of complex flavors and aromas.

A refreshing and tangy non-alcoholic drink made from the zesty combination of fresh lemon juice, a pinch of salt, and sparkling soda water. Salt Lemon Soda is a perfect thirst-quencher with a unique balance of salty and sour, making it an ideal drink for hot days or to accompany meals.

Freshly squeezed or bottled lemon juice, renowned for its bright, tangy flavor. It is a versatile ingredient used in both cooking and beverages, offering a refreshing, citrusy punch to a variety of dishes and drinks.

A flavorful and fusion-style pasta dish, combining the richness of seafood with the bold, aromatic flavors of Tom Yum sauce. This dish features perfectly cooked pasta, complemented by a mix of fresh seafood, all enveloped in a spicy, tangy, and fragrant Tom Yum sauce inspired by traditional Thai cuisine.

product.productName: SEAFOOD PASTA WITH SALTED EGG PRODUCTS
product.description: A rich and indulgent seafood pasta dish featuring a savory salted egg sauce that coats the pasta and seafood with a creamy, umami flavor. This fusion dish combines the richness of salted egg with the natural sweetness of seafood, creating a unique and satisfying meal.

product.productName: FRESH PASTA WITH  BEEF SAUCE TOMATOES
product.description: A classic Italian-inspired pasta dish featuring fresh, handmade pasta paired with a rich, savory beef tomato sauce. The hearty beef sauce is simmered with ripe tomatoes and aromatic herbs, creating a comforting and satisfying meal.

product.productName: FRESH PASTA WITH SALMON AND CREAM
product.description: A creamy, indulgent pasta dish featuring fresh, handmade pasta paired with tender salmon in a rich, velvety cream sauce. The sauce is delicately flavored with herbs and a hint of lemon, creating a perfect balance to complement the richness of the salmon and the fresh pasta.

product.productName: FRESH PASTA WITH BACON, CHEESE SAUCE
product.description: A creamy and indulgent pasta dish featuring fresh, handmade pasta paired with crispy bacon and a rich, velvety cheese sauce. The bacon adds a savory, smoky flavor that complements the creamy cheese sauce, making for a comforting and satisfying meal.

product.productName: FRESH PASTA WITH CREAMY SAUSAGE & VEGETABLES
product.description: A flavorful and hearty pasta dish featuring fresh, handmade pasta paired with a creamy sauce made from savory sausage and colorful, tender vegetables. The rich cream sauce balances the flavors of the sausage, while the vegetables add freshness and texture.

product.productName: SPINACH WITH BLACK PEPPER SAUCE & VEGETABLES
product.description: A simple yet flavorful vegetable dish featuring fresh spinach sautéed with a black pepper sauce and complemented by a medley of colorful vegetables. The rich and aromatic black pepper sauce enhances the freshness of the spinach, while the vegetables add texture and sweetness.

product.productName: SMOKED GOOSE LOOKING SALAD WITH ROASTED SESAME SAUCE
product.description: A sophisticated and flavorful salad featuring tender smoked goose meat paired with crisp fresh greens and vegetables, all tossed in a rich, nutty roasted sesame sauce. The smokiness of the goose contrasts beautifully with the refreshing vegetables, while the sesame sauce adds a deep, earthy flavor.

product.productName: BEEF, CHICKEN, TUNA SALAD MIXED WITH BBQ SAUCE
product.description: A hearty and protein-packed salad combining tender beef, succulent chicken, and flavorful tuna, all tossed with a smoky BBQ sauce and fresh vegetables. This dish offers a variety of textures and flavors, with the savory meats paired perfectly with the bold, tangy BBQ sauce.

product.productName: BEEF, TUNA SALAD MIXED WITH SPICY AND SOUR SAUCE
product.description: A vibrant, flavorful salad featuring a combination of tender beef and tuna, tossed with a zesty spicy and sour sauce. The mix of protein-rich beef and tuna pairs perfectly with the tangy and spicy dressing, making this a bold and satisfying dish.

product.productName: BEEF, TUNA SALAD MIXED WITH MAYONNAISE SAUCE
product.description: A creamy and satisfying salad combining tender beef and tuna, tossed with a rich mayonnaise dressing. The creamy sauce enhances the savory flavors of the meats, creating a hearty and comforting dish with a perfect balance of textures.

product.productName: SAUSAGE, BACON SALAD WITH CHEESE SAUCE
product.description: A hearty and indulgent salad featuring savory sausage and crispy bacon, complemented by a rich and creamy cheese sauce. This dish is perfect for those who enjoy a combination of bold flavors and a satisfying texture, offering both the richness of the meats and the creaminess of the cheese sauce.

A unique and refreshing combination of fresh mulberries mixed with a light, crisp salad, topped with a scoop of creamy ice cream. This dessert salad is the perfect blend of sweet, tart, and creamy flavors, ideal for those looking for a sweet treat with a fruity twist.
